resources.string: Are you passionate about nature and adventure? Choose the options that best suit your exploring spirit!
Are you a lover of culture and history? Select destinations that awaken your curiosity and passion for the past.
Looking to relax and recharge? Select destinations that offer you maximum tranquility and well-being.
Would you like to improve your experience and get better and accurate travel recommendations based on your location?
To improve your experience and receive recommendations tailored to your preferences, please choose a location-based search preference that fits your needs.
It seems that you do not have an internet connection. Please try again later.
For location preferences on the same continent, country or city, it is required to have GPS active.\n What do you want to do?

Developed by a passionate team of Colombian mobile developers, TrekScape is your go-to app for personalized travel experiences. Whether you crave adventure, cultural exploration, or relaxation, we tailor recommendations just for you. 

Our Features: 
-Travel Preferences: Choose from Nature and Adventure, Culture and History, or Relaxation and Wellbeing. 
- Custom Recommendations: Discover destinations worldwide, within your continent, country, or city. 
- Interactive Map: View and explore recommended spots with images, names, and descriptions. 
- History and Favorites: Save and revisit your favorite places, and manage your recommendations. 
- Powered by Gemini AI: Get personalized suggestions with an advanced AI. 

Embark on your next adventure with TrekScape, where every journey is crafted for you. Happy travels!

You have reached the limit of 5 uses of our special features. To keep our app free and ad-free, we\'ve implemented an API key system. By adding your own key, you can enjoy unlimited use of the app. Please note that using these APIs may incur additional costs based on your usage and Google Cloud Platform plans. Activate the Generative AI (Generative Language API) and Places (New API) on Google Cloud Platform to get your key and start enjoying a full experience.
You have only one attempt left to generate places. If you want to use this feature without limits, please enter your own Google key. Would you like to add your key now?
"The entered Api key doesn't met the minimum requeriments, please enter a valid api key "

Your API key is valid! You can now generate unlimited recommendations. Please note that using this API may incur additional costs based on your usage on Google Cloud Platform. By clicking "Save," you confirm and agree that you are solely responsible for any associated costs. Additionally, your API key will be securely stored on your device to ensure your privacy and will not be exposed or stored in the cloud.
